salesforce:query-single.doc:name: Get Contact
salesforce:query-single.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT CustomerId__c, FirstName, LastName, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingPostalCode, MailingState, MailingCountry, Phone, Email, OtherStreet, OtherCity, OtherPostalCode, OtherState, OtherCountry FROM Contact WHERE CustomerId__c = ':customerId'

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { customerId: payload.CustomerId__c, firstName: payload.FirstName, lastName: payload.LastName, phoneNumber: payload.Phone, emailAddress: payload.Email, deliveryAddresses: [ { "type": "SHIPPING", address: payload.OtherStreet, city: payload.OtherCity, postalCode: payload.OtherPostalCode, state: payload.OtherState, country: payload.OtherCountry }, { "type": "BILLING", address: payload.MailingStreet, city: payload.MailingCity, postalCode: payload.MailingPostalCode, state: payload.MailingState, country: payload.MailingCountry } ] }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { CustomerId__c: payload.customerId, FirstName: payload.firstName, LastName: payload.lastName, MailingStreet: payload.deliveryAddresses[1].street, MailingCity: payload.deliveryAddresses[1].city, MailingPostalCode: payload.deliveryAddresses[1].postalCode, MailingState: payload.deliveryAddresses[1].state, MailingCountry: payload.deliveryAddresses[1].country, Phone: payload.phone, Email: payload.email, OtherStreet: payload.deliveryAddresses[0].street, OtherCity: payload.deliveryAddresses[0].city, OtherPostalCode: payload.deliveryAddresses[0].postalCode, OtherState: payload.deliveryAddresses[0].state, OtherCountry: payload.deliveryAddresses[0].country }

salesforce:query-single.doc:name: Check Contact
salesforce:query-single.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT Id FROM Contact WHERE CustomerId__c=':customerId'

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { Id: payload.Id, CustomerId__c: vars.updatedContact.customerId, FirstName: vars.updatedContact.firstName, LastName: vars.updatedContact.lastName, MailingStreet: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[1].street, MailingCity: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[1].city, MailingPostalCode: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[1].postalCode, MailingState: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[1].state, MailingCountry: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[1].country, Phone: vars.updatedContact.phone, (Email: vars.updatedContact.email) if vars.updatedContact.email?, OtherStreet: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[0].street, OtherCity: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[0].city, OtherPostalCode: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[0].postalCode, OtherState: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[0].state, OtherCountry: vars.updatedContact.deliveryAddresses[0].country }
